content.description:
The Uphill Arete is just right of

Moai

. Start with a right hand and right heel on the arete and left hand on a sidepull. Go up, working along the arete to the top. This is slightly highball. It is nice to have a spotter. This has sharp holds -- grit your teeth.
content.location:
Park at the teal treatment plant, and follow the trail up about 5 minutes. Wander right through the forest to a pretty big boulder. On the side facing back down toward the treatment house is a 15 foot tall vertical face with a perfectly flat landing. This is

Moai

, AKA Tall Face.

content.description: This project ascends the left side of the face left of Easter Island.
content.location:
Park at the teal treatment plant, and follow the trail up about 5 minutes. Wander right through the forest to a pretty big boulder. On the side facing back down toward the treatment house is a 15 foot tall vertical face with a perfectly flat landing. This is

Moai

, AKA Tall Face.

content.description: Moai is the dead vertical, blank face. Go straight up the micro-crimps on bullet stone. The holds get better toward the top, but it's not over until you've topped it out.
content.location: Park at the teal treatment plant, and follow the trail up about 5 minutes. Wander right through the forest to a pretty big boulder. On the side facing back down toward the treatment house is a 15 foot tall vertical face with a perfectly flat landing. This is Moai, AKA Tall Face.

content.description:
The Funnel starts up the seam/crack behind the tree, just left of

Moai

. Ride the Funnel to the top.
content.location:
Park at the teal treatment plant, and follow the trail up about 5 minutes. Wander right through the forest to a pretty big boulder. On the side facing back down toward the treatment house is a 15 foot tall vertical face with a perfectly flat landing. This is

Moai

, AKA Tall Face.

content.description:
From halfway up

Easter Island

, traverse left on slopers and top out.
content.location:
Park at the teal treatment plant, and follow the trail up about 5 minutes. Wander right through the forest to a pretty big boulder. On the side facing back down toward the treatment house is a 15 foot tall vertical face with a perfectly flat landing. This is

Moai

, AKA Tall Face.

content.description:
Easter Island starts on the Southeast corner of the boulder, just to the left of the tree that obscures

The Funnel

. Go straight up the corner topping out via slopers.
content.location:
Park at the teal treatment plant, and follow the trail up about 5 minutes. Wander right through the forest to a pretty big boulder. On the side facing back down toward the treatment house is a 15 foot tall vertical face with a perfectly flat landing. This is
